short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CSS optimizations to improve user experience on www.toyota-4runner.org

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Short and simple - makes images on T4R.org no wider than 85% of its bounding container - keeps giant images from making the display go out of control

Version log:

v.0.0.08 - Fixed quirk on "reply" pages where images weren't resized

v.0.0.07 - Narrowed down the scope of the affected images; bumped to 85%

v.0.0.06 - made the toolbar icon light up on toyota-4runner.org pages

v.0.0.05 - added icon for toolbar

v.0.0.04 - fixed bug where reply smilies were tiny.  Made them not-so-tiny.

v.0.0.03 - initial release
